casebody.data:
State
v.
Avenger Ridgeway 273A01-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Avenger D. Ridgeway, for Ridgeway, Avenger. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2016 by Defendant to Amend Petition: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016." Ervin, J. recused
